Posts.Content: Hey Flkjr, Glad to read you are feeling positive! Warm wishes and thoughts to you.
Posts.Signature: Rest in Peace, Mom, 11-21-12 Daughter of Fleurette, Gathering Support to End Discrimination Against Survivors and Patients of Cancer ~ http://wp.me/p3Akmm-7 Mar 2010- Full Rt Mastectomy, Chemo & Rad through Mar 2011- One Year Old "Birthday"- Remission through Mar 2012- Recurrence of Tumor Apr 2012- Surgery May 1, 2012- FIRED from 38 year long employment for missing time, due to surgery Aug 24, 2012- Breast Cancer Metastasized to Liver Nov 21, 2012- Rest in Peace, Mom, I love you and miss you.
Posts.Title: daVinci soon
